Interface KeyDecoder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultDecoderImpl

    public interface KeyDecoder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String decodeAsString(byte[] keyAsBytes)
      Decodes SecretKeySpec.getEncoded() PBE-key bytes into String representation.

    • Method Detail

      • decodeAsString

        String decodeAsString(byte[] keyAsBytes)
        Decodes SecretKeySpec.getEncoded() PBE-key bytes into String representation.
        Parameters:
        keyAsBytes - Encoded bytes.
        Returns:
        String value which was available from PBEKeySpec.getPassword() before key was saved to KeyStore.
